name: The Legend of Trykon
description:
One Game a Week 2019 -- Game #4. A 3D action-adventure game with puzzle elements, created in the spirit of Zelda-style games!

Check out my development blog at www.trykonstudios.com/blog to read more about my game development process!

-------------------------------

CONTROLS

Arrow keys/WASD to move

B to swing sword

Space bar to push blocks/open doors

--------------------------------
